results.title: The Healers of Aro
results.creator_credit: Ben Park, United Nations Films and Ronald Fleher
results.brief_description: Describes an experiment in community mental health in Nigeria. Many people from countries engaged in rapid social changes cannot take the cross-cultural shock of development. For these people treatment combines western psychiatric techniques with ancient rituals, thereby not isolating them from society. Narrated by Ben Park.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ben Park, United Nations Films and Ronald Fleher

results.title: The Hazzards: 1959-1983
results.brief_description:
The artists Charles and Sheena Hazzard offer through the lens of their 8mm camera, a unique historical film record of life in the Bundaberg region of Queensland. We see not only their family journeying through life but also their long-term commitment to art in the community.
In the triptych format, the narrator, Nicholas Hazzard (the youngest son) is seen concurrently as a baby, teenager and married with children. the notion of chronological time is disrupted and temporal montage is combined with spatial montage. Multilinear narratives occur across the three concurrent streams of video. Nicholas’ direct response to the footage presents a historical and geographical context on the Bundaberg region.

results.title: The Haunting of Barney Palmer
results.brief_description: Barney Palmer was eight years old when his haunting began, Whispers in the waves, images in the mirror, voices in his dreams. Is it the ghost of his great Uncle Barnaby or is it the ghost of somebody not yet dead? Someone, somewhere in this world or in the next is promising to carry him away. For Barney, the answer lies close within the strength of his home.

results.title: The Haunting
results.brief_description: The Haunting directed by Robert Wise is a horror film. With impressive black and white cinematography and without the use of big special effects this is a fine example of a haunted house horror film. As an experiment on haunted houses an academic selects ‘receptive’ participants to take part in a study in supernatural phenomenon. Two being female and one who happens to be the inheritor on the house in question. There is an underlying lesbian tension between the female couple who are terrified and drawn together by the extremely frightening and inexplicable movements of the house. The film is a gripping and very well made horror film without high tech special effects. Cast includes Julie Harris, Claire Blood, Richard Johnson and Russ Tamblyn.

results.title: The Haunted huntress. Night of the leopard
results.creator_credit: Owen Newman, Amanda Barrett, Keith Scholey, National Geographic Society and BBC
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World of wildlife”.
Narrated by David Attenborough, “The Haunted huntress” looks at the changing fortunes of a cheetah mother and her cubs as they attempt to survive the harsh environment of Kenya’s Masai Mara. “Night of the leopard” reveals the amazing nocturnal world of a leopard mother and her cubs as she battles with lions, hyenas and crocodiles.

results.title: The Haunted house of horror
results.creator_credit: Tony Tenser, Tigon and Michael Armstrong
results.brief_description: A game in an old haunted house is suddenly shattered by uncontrollable violence. As merriment turns to vulnerability, the party-goers try and halt the roller-coaster descent towards madness and the tragic, terrifying climax. Only those with nerves strong enough to witness the psychotic happenings in this House of Horrors, will know what lies waiting in the dark.

results.title: The Hat
results.creator_credit: Morton Schindel, Kratky Film and Gene Deitch
results.brief_description: Performing countless breathtaking missions on command, a magical hat brings love and fortune to Benito Badaglio, a penniless veteran. Based on the book by Tomi Ungerer.

results.title: The Hat
results.creator_credit: Storyboard, Institute for International Peace, John Hubley and Faith Hubley
results.brief_description: An amusing treatment of the serious matter of World Peace and International Disputes. Two sentries are patrolling the border between hostile countries; one drops his hat and it falls across the line. When he tries to retrieve it war becomes imminent. Uses an interesting liquid form of animation. Dialogue and music are improvised by Dizzy Gillespie and Dudley Moore.

results.title: The Hasans: a Buginese trading family
results.creator_credit: John Morris, Brian Hannant and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Our Asian neighbours: Indonesia”.
The Bugis were once the feared pirates of the Java Sea. Today they run trading junks (Prahu) between the islands of Indonesia. This film is about the Hasan family, who runs a fleet of boats from the West Java port of Surabaya. Pak Hasan operate the trading ships on the Java sea. Their history and that of their business shows the strength, stamina and skill contributed by the sons, and the guidance and experience on their father.

results.title: The Harvey girls
results.creator_credit: Arthur Freed, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and George Sidney
results.brief_description: It is the end of the nineteenth century and the future lies in the wild west. Judy Garland is a young woman attracted to the work opportunities along the great Sante Fe railway. Of all opportunities available there is none more alluring than Frank Harvey’s chain of hotels and restaurants. Making her way out west she joins Anglea Lansbury, Marjorie Main, Cyd Charisse and a great Hollywood cast to become one of the “Harvey Girls”. This opulent and sunny film is a great example of the Hollywood musical genre and features an outstanding musical score by Johnny Mercer and Harry Warren (songs include “Oh, You Kid”, “On the Atchison”, “Topeka and the Santa Fe”). Cast also includes John Hodiak, Ray Bolger, Preston S. Foster.
